# Ace Citizenship

> Free iOS app for U.S. citizenship test preparation with all 128 official USCIS civics questions.

For comprehensive information, see: [llms-full.txt](https://acecitizenship.app/llms-full.txt)

## About

Ace Citizenship is a free iOS app helping aspiring U.S. citizens prepare for the naturalization civics test. Features all 128 official USCIS questions with spaced repetition learning for efficient long-term retention.

## Key Features

- All 128 official USCIS civics test questions
- Spaced repetition algorithm for optimal memorization
- Progress tracking with detailed statistics
- Audio pronunciation for each question
- App Clip for instant demo experience
- Dark mode support
- Offline access - no internet required
- 100% free - no ads, no in-app purchases

## App Details

- **Platform**: iOS / iPadOS
- **Price**: Free
- **Developer**: 941 Apps, LLC
- **App Store**: [Download](https://apps.apple.com/app/id6532592671)

## Content

The app covers all civics topics tested in the naturalization interview:
- American Government (principles, system of government, rights and responsibilities)
- American History (colonial period, 1800s, recent history)
- Integrated Civics (geography, symbols, holidays)

## Blog

Educational content about U.S. citizenship, civics, and naturalization:
- [Blog](https://acecitizenship.app/blog)

## Contact

- Support: https://acecitizenship.app/support
